cirklo.cirklo_merchants_info: These are the merchants where you can use your vouchers.

cirklo.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, please retry again later.

cirklo.voucher_used_up_description: This voucher is completely used up. Would you like to give your local traders some extra support? Then surf to {{url}}
cirklo.vouchers_info: Have you recently purchased or received a gift voucher from your city or municipality via Cirklo Light? Then you can upload its value here. So you always have it in your pocket! Scan the QR code of your receipt by pressing the button below and have fun shopping!
